trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_000<tab>Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...

TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_001<tab>All I need is your memory of someone, someone who made a <var 1A 02 /var>strong<var 1A 01 /var> impression. Someone unforgettable, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_002<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A1_000_001<tab>A journey to forge this realm anew.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A1_000_002<tab>A journey to end a conflict of one thousand years.

TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_003<tab>Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_001<tab>A Padjali woman as gentle yet indomitable as nature itself.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_002<tab>A stalwart Roegadyn woman of unshakable conviction.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_003<tab>A rugged Hyuran man unmatched in loyalty and valor.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_004<tab>A charming and compassionate Lalafellin lady of noble birth.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_005<tab>A courageous and clever Garlean man admired by many.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_006<tab>A wry and ambitious Garlean man who hates to be outdone.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_007<tab>An eccentric Miqo'te man crimson of both hair and eye.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_008<tab>A compassionate Hyuran woman who leads a “secret” organization.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_009<tab>A formidable Roegadyn man recognized for his tactical brilliance.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_010<tab>A stunning Miqo'te woman famed as a peerless songstress.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_011<tab>A Hyuran gentleman with an irrepressibly inquisitive nature.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_012<tab>A loyal Miqo'te woman who assists a gentleman inspector.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_013<tab>A Hyuran man who began life anew in a realm reborn.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_014<tab>An eager Lalafellin woman who is the coinkeeper of a “secret” organization.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_100_015<tab>A Hyuran man who is known as Eorzea's most fearsome goldsmith.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_009<tab>A blue-eyed Elezen man with a heart noble and true.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_010<tab>A tenacious half-Elezen woman who fights for what is just.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_011<tab>A robed Lalafellin woman of the intellectual persuasion.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_012<tab>A proud Elezen man unmatched in the art of the lance.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_013<tab>A daring Hyuran man who lives free as a bird.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_014<tab>An Elezen man of noble birth fond of gossip and hearsay.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_015<tab>A Hyuran man who turned his gaze heavensward.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_A2_000_025<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_004<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The transfiguration can be removed by using the “Unveil” action, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM_00834_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_010<tab>Pay no mind to this little imp! I'm <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> busy during the Wake─I've no time for mundane mummers, no.
